youtubeSpotifyConverter
  • <no title>
  • View page source
class youtubeSpotifyConverter.youtubeSpotifyConverter(YT_API_KEY: str, SP_CLIENT_ID: str, SP_CLIENT_SECRET: str)[source]

A module that converts spotify URLs to youtube and vice versa. There is the ability to output a youtube music URL but it is not 100% reliable as links may not work properly so it is not recommended to use that function.

The API keys are passed in on instantiation. You can get the keys at:

Youtube: https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials Spotify: https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications

Methods and variables that relate to youtube have YT_ before the name Methods and variables that relate to spotify have SP_ before the name Methods that make up the link converter have C_ before the name

C_fromLink(link: str)[source]

takes in a link to either youtube/youtube music or spotify and returns a links to the same content in other services. services names: youtube, youtubeMusic, spotify

Parameters

  • link (str) – The link you want to convert

  • music (bool) – Whether or not to also include a youtube music link

Returns

A dictionary of key-value pairs where the key is the service name and value is the URL that should match the name. Also has a pair called name containing the song and it’s artist’s name

Return type

dict

C_fromTitle(name: str)[source]

takes in a song name and returns links to youtube, youtube music, and spotify that should match services names: youtube, youtubeMusic, spotify

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the song (you can get more accurate searches with artist in the name) that you want links to

Returns

A dictionary of key-value pairs where the key is the service name and value is the URL that should match the name

Return type

dict

SP_get(id: str)[source]

gets a spotify song from an Id and returns info about it in json form

Parameters

id (str) – The song that you want to find’s id.

Returns

Json data about the channel specified in the id

Return type

json

SP_search(keyword: str)[source]

gets the first song from a spotify search and returns info about it in json form

Parameters

keyword (str) – The string to search for.

gets a youtube channel from an Id and returns info about it in json form

YT_getVideo(id: str)[source]

gets a youtube video from an Id and returns info about it in json form

Parameters

Returns

YT_idIntoURL(id: str)[source]

turns a youtube Id into a URL

Parameters

id (str) – The Id that you want a URL for

Returns

A youtube URL

Return type

str

YT_intoMusic(URL: str)[source]

turns a youtube URL into a youtube music URL. Note: this will not always work, and will not work on URLs to anything that isn’t music

Parameters

URL (str) – The youtube URL that will be changed

Returns

A youtube music URL

Return type

str

YT_search(keyword: str)[source]

gets the first song from a youtube search and returns info about it in json form

Parameters

keyword (str) – The keyword to search for.

Returns

Json data about the video found by the search

Return type

object
